1. ファイルはデータそのもの
2. フォルダは、ファイルとフォルダの入れ物

{"parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"パスとは","href":null}],"color":"default","is_toggleable":false}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"先にファイルとフォルダの復習をしたのにはもちろん意味があって…\nパスはこれらの構造を表すものです。\nとは言っても「ファイル管理のススメ」にもあったと思いますが、もしこれを全て表そうとする一行では足りません。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ですが、以下のprac2-3.pyに向かうと考えると…","href":null}]}

```text
Desktop
	├─python
	│   └─practices
	│       ├─prac1
	│       ├─prac2
	│       │   ├─prac2-1.py
	│       │   ├─prac2-2.py
	│       │   └─prac2-3.py
	│       ├─prac3
	│       ├─prac4
	│       └─pra
	├─CPP
	│  └─practices
```

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Desktop→python→practices→prac2→prac2-3.pyという一通りしか道がないことがわかると思います。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これを見て、「これなら一行で書けそうだな〜」と思ってくれたでしょうか？\n思いましたよね？\nそう、思うんですよ。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"冗談はさておき、この一行で書いたものを定式化したもの、それがパスなんです。","href":null}]}

**`ls`****（フォルダの中身を表示）
L**ist の略
フォルダの中身を横に羅列(隠しファイルや隠しフォルダは非表示)

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"一行目が打ち方で二行目以降が実行結果","href":null}]}

prac2-1.py   prac2-2.py   prac2-3.py
user@MacBook prac2 % 
```
フォルダの中身を全て横に羅列(オプション「**`a`**」)

```

Remove の略
ファイルの削除

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"後述のtouchでファイル作成の後、四行目が打ち方で五行目以降が実行結果の確認","href":null}]}

```text
user@MacBook practices % touch new_file.py
user@MacBook practices % ls
new_file.py prac1       prac2       prac3       prac4       prac5
user@MacBook practices % rm new_file.py
user@MacBook practices % ls
prac1   prac2   prac3   prac4   prac5
user@MacBook practices % 
```
フォルダ(とその中身)の削除(オプション「**`r`**」)

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"mkdirでフォルダ作成の後、四行目が打ち方で五行目以降が実行結果の確認","href":null}]}

```text
user@MacBook practices % mkdir new_folder
user@MacBook practices % ls
new_folder  prac1       prac2       prac3       prac4       prac5
user@MacBook practices % rm -r new_folder
user@MacBook practices % ls
prac1   prac2   prac3   prac4   prac5
user@MacBook practices % 
```

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"echo ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"red"},"plain_text":"\"\"","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"yellow"},"plain_text":" > ファイル","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"（文字列内に書いた文面を指定したファイルに出力）","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"\n新規ファイル作成または既存ファイルなら","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"red"},"plain_text":"上書き","href":null}]}

```text
user@MacBook prac2 % echo 'print("New script")' > new_script.py
user@MacBook prac2 % ls
new_script.py  prac2-1.py  prac2-2.py  prac2-3.py
user@MacBook prac2 % cat new_script.py
print("New script")
user@MacBook prac2 % 
```
